subject: Re: [junit] Problem with setup()
msgSnippet: Hi, ... Perhaps you should provide a minimum example that shows the problem. Just guessing from your spelling and ignorance of how to use the shift key in
messageBody:
Hi,

> when i am writing the test cases them if i initialize
> anything in the setup() method (which is to be used by
> all the methods) then on running the tests it gives me
> NULL POINTER EXCEPTION.

Perhaps you should provide a minimum example that shows the problem.

Just guessing from your spelling and ignorance of how to use the shift
key in emails... did you write setup instead of setUp?

Robert
